english: broad; to spread; universal; surname Pu

etymology.interpretation: 氵 evokes water and, by extension, the idea of diffusion or wide spreading. 尃 provides the sound (pǔ) and also carries a sense of broad dissemination, reinforcing the meanings “broad” and “to spread.”

examples.chinese: 国君的恩泽溥及四方(國君的恩澤溥及四方)。
examples.pinyin: Guójūn de ēnzé pǔ jí sìfāng.
examples.english: The ruler’s benevolence spreads to the four corners.

examples.chinese: 他的名声溥闻天下(他的名聲溥聞天下)。
examples.english: His fame is widely heard under heaven.
